column2: select AD.CN_ID as AD_CN_ID,  PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(AD.CN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as AD_CN_DATE , AD.ADJUST_AMT - CN.REFUND_TOTAL_AMT as AD_CN_DIFF_AMT , convert(int, convert(char(8), AD.CN_DATE, 112)) - convert(int, convert(char(8), CN.CN_DATE, 112)) as AD_CN_DIFF_DATE , CN.CN_NO, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(CN.CN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as CN_DATE , CN.CATEGORY_CODE, CN.BANK_CODE from PMDB..PM_ADJUST_TRANSACTION AD left join PMDB..PM_CREDIT_NOTE CN on (AD.CN_ID = CN.CN_ID and AD.CN_DATE = CN.CN_DATE) where AD.ADJUST_ID = @order_id
